name: Sleigh w/Me
description:
There’s this sleigh. It’s alone, unprotected, and piled high with an unfeasibly large pile of consumer goods. You’re the only ones here – you can take the stuff, or try to deliver it to children around the world. Only, first you have to figure out how to make it stop.

Sleigh w/Me is a madcap, quickfire game where you play children trying to save Christmas, or criminals trying to steal it. Either way, you're stuck on an out-of-control sleigh and you need to get it to safety!

Excellent for playing with children or adults alike.
